__prompts__.lambda_name: The name of the lambda (ex: studio-archive-trigger)
__prompts__.description: One line description of what the lambda is doing
__prompts__.schedule_expression: AWS Scheduler schedule expression (ignored if not triggered by scheduler)
__prompts__.schedule_timezone: Timezone for the schedule expression (ignored if not triggered by scheduler)
__prompts__.sqs_queue: Name of the SQS queue the lambda will interact with (ignored if no interaction with SQS)
__prompts__.is_triggered_by_sqs: If the lambda will be triggered by a SQS queue
__prompts__.is_triggered_by_scheduler: If the lambda will be triggered by AWS Scheduler
__prompts__.is_writting_to_sqs: If the lambda will write to the SQS queue
